original_text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi, who receive the office of the priesthood, have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law, that is, of their brethren, though they come out of the loins of Abraham:
korean_text: 레위의 아들들 가운데 제사장의 직분을 받은 자들은 율법을 따라 아브라함의 허리에서 난 자라도 자기 형제인 백성에게서 십분의 일을 취하라는 명령을 받았으나

sentences.original_text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi,
who receive the office of the priesthood,
have a commandment to take tithes of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 백성에게서 십일조를 받을 명령을 가지고 있으니

sentences.original_text: though they come out of the loins of Abraham:
